thread.title: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse
thread.title_full: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse

title: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse
text: > Pennsylvania Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse Renita Hill, center, who appeared on an educational children's TV show as a teenager with Bill Cosby in the 1980's, sits between two of her attorneys, Ken Haber, left, and George Kontos, at a news conference about a lawsuit against Cosby, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in Pittsburgh. Hill claims he defamed her after she gave an interview claiming he sexually abused her in the 1980's. (AP Photo/Keith Srakocic)
